languages.text: "Нарушать? Не следует трактовать это как нарушение. Вольные Торговцы обладают не только привилегиями, но и долгом — долгом расширять границы влияния человеческого. Если для исполнения сего Вольный Торговец берет на себя ответственность за необычные решения и действия, то так тому и быть".

"Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privileges come with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If the Rogue Trader must take responsibility for unorthodox solutions or actions in the course of performing that duty, then so be it."
languages.original_text: "Нарушать? Не следует трактовать это как нарушение. Вольные Торговцы обладают не только привилегиями, но и долгом — долгом расширять границы влияния человеческого. Если для исполнения сего Вольный Торговец берет на себя ответственность за необычные решения и действия, то так тому и быть".

traits.locale_text: "Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privilege comes with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If, in order to render that duty, the Rogue Trader takes responsibility for unusual solutions or actions, then so be it."

"Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privilege comes with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If, in order to render that duty, the Rogue Trader takes responsibility for unusual solutions or actions, then so be it."

"Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privileges come with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If the Rogue Trader must take responsibility for unorthodox solutions or actions in the course of performing that duty, then so be it."

"Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privileges come with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If the Rogue Trader must take responsibility for unorthodox solutions or actions in the course of performing that duty, then so be it."

"Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privileges come with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If the Rogue Trader must take responsibility for unorthodox solutions or actions in the course of performing that duty, then so be it."

"Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privileges come with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If the Rogue Trader must take responsibility for unorthodox solutions or actions in the course of performing that duty, then so be it."

languages.text: « De l'enfreindre ? Ces actes ne doivent pas être considérés comme des transgressions. Les privilèges d'un libre-marchand s'accompagnent d'un devoir : celui de repousser les limites de l'influence humaine. Si un libre-marchand estime qu'il est nécessaire d'employer des méthodes inhabituelles dans l'accomplissement de ce devoir, personne ne pourra le lui reprocher. »
languages.original_text: "Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privileges come with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If the Rogue Trader must take responsibility for unorthodox solutions or actions in the course of performing that duty, then so be it."

traits.locale_text: « De l'enfreindre ? Ces actes ne doivent pas être considérés comme des transgressions. Les privilèges d'un libre-marchand s'accompagnent d'un devoir : celui de repousser les limites de l'influence humaine. Si un libre-marchand estime qu'il est nécessaire d'employer des méthodes inhabituelles dans l'accomplissement de ce devoir, personne ne pourra le lui reprocher. »

languages.text: «¿Violar? Tal regalía no ha de considerarse como una violación. Los privilegios de un Comerciante Independiente conllevan un deber: el deber de expandir los límites de la influencia humana. Si un Comerciante Independiente necesita perpetrar soluciones o actos poco ortodoxos para ello, así ha de ser».
languages.original_text: "Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privileges come with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If the Rogue Trader must take responsibility for unorthodox solutions or actions in the course of performing that duty, then so be it."

traits.locale_text: «¿Violar? Tal regalía no ha de considerarse como una violación. Los privilegios de un Comerciante Independiente conllevan un deber: el deber de expandir los límites de la influencia humana. Si un Comerciante Independiente necesita perpetrar soluciones o actos poco ortodoxos para ello, así ha de ser».

languages.text: “违背？这些行为不能认为是在违背教条。行商浪人的特权伴随着责任而来，扩大人类影响力的重大责任。若是行商浪人为了履行这样的义务，而不得不寻求非常规的解决方案，采取不同寻常的行动，那就这么做吧。”
languages.original_text: "Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privileges come with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If the Rogue Trader must take responsibility for unorthodox solutions or actions in the course of performing that duty, then so be it."

traits.locale_text: “违背？这些行为不能认为是在违背教条。行商浪人的特权伴随着责任而来，扩大人类影响力的重大责任。若是行商浪人为了履行这样的义务，而不得不寻求非常规的解决方案，采取不同寻常的行动，那就这么做吧。”

languages.text: 「違反？これらは違反なんかではありません。ローグトレーダーの特権には義務が伴う。その義務を果たすために、ローグトレーダーが通常とは異なる解決策や行動に責任を負うのであれば、そういう事だ」
languages.original_text: "Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privileges come with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If the Rogue Trader must take responsibility for unorthodox solutions or actions in the course of performing that duty, then so be it."

traits.locale_text: 「違反？これらは違反なんかではありません。ローグトレーダーの特権には義務が伴う。その義務を果たすために、ローグトレーダーが通常とは異なる解決策や行動に責任を負うのであれば、そういう事だ」

languages.text: "Verstoßen? Das darf nicht als Verstoß angesehen werden. Die Privilegien eines Freihändlers gehen mit einer Pflicht einher. Der Pflicht, die Grenzen des menschlichen Einflusses zu erweitern. Wenn ein Freihändler bei der Ausübung dieser Pflicht die Verantwortung für unorthodoxe Lösungen oder Taten übernehmen muss, dann ist das eben so."
languages.original_text: "Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privileges come with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If the Rogue Trader must take responsibility for unorthodox solutions or actions in the course of performing that duty, then so be it."

traits.locale_text: "Verstoßen? Das darf nicht als Verstoß angesehen werden. Die Privilegien eines Freihändlers gehen mit einer Pflicht einher. Der Pflicht, die Grenzen des menschlichen Einflusses zu erweitern. Wenn ein Freihändler bei der Ausübung dieser Pflicht die Verantwortung für unorthodoxe Lösungen oder Taten übernehmen muss, dann ist das eben so."

languages.text: "İhlal etmek mi? Bunlar ihlal olarak değerlendirilemez. Bir Hür Tacir'in imtiyazları, yanında sorumluluk da getirir: İnsan nüfuzunun sınırlarını genişletme sorumluluğu. Eğer Hür Tacir'in bu sorumluluğu yerine getirmek için olağan olmayan çözümlere veya eylemlere başvurması gerekiyorsa, varsın olsun."
languages.original_text: "Violate? Those are not to be conceived of as violations. A Rogue Trader's privileges come with a duty — the duty to expand the bounds of human influence. If the Rogue Trader must take responsibility for unorthodox solutions or actions in the course of performing that duty, then so be it."
